import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { addItem } from '../../redux/cart/cartActions' import CustomButton from '../custom-button/CustomButton' import { CollectionItemContainer, AddButton, BackgroundImage, CollectionFooterContainer, NameContainer, PriceContainer, } from './CollectionItemStyles' const CollectionItem = ({ item, addItem }) => { const { name, price, imageUrl } = item return (
{name} ${price}
addItem(item)} inverted> Add to cart
) } const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => ({ addItem: (item) => dispatch(addItem(item)), }) export default connect(null, mapDispatchToProps)(CollectionItem)
